title: Positional Encoding Visualization

definitions.p(t): p(t) = sin(ω1.t) + cos(ω1.t) + sin(ω2.t) + cos(ω2.t) + sin(ωd/2.t) + cos(ωd/2.t)

formulas: p(t) = sin(ω1.t) + cos(ω1.t) + sin(ω2.t) + cos(ω2.t) + sin(ωd/2.t) + cos(ωd/2.t)
summary: The slide presents a visualization of positional encoding in neural networks, showing how different frequencies are encoded. It includes a graph with multiple sinusoidal functions and a table with probabilities for different frequencies. The formula for positional encoding is also provided.
